## Include a slide deck

Your report shall be accompanied by a slide deck which tells the data story with visuals in a *narrative structure*^[See *Effective Data Storytelling*, Brent Dykes (2020), Figure 4.3.]. 

![](img/dykes_storyformats.png){fig-align="center"}
